Articles.Content:
So again,I've built a huge big rocket that flied me to minmus.I've planted a flag there and flied away.After recovering the vessel,I switched to tracking station...and it shows that there's no flag at minmus :| I've spent 3 hours designing that rocket,had various adventures,and now there's no proof of it.Poor Bob,it was his first adventure.

Anyway,where could the flag go?

I was launching my lander back pretty far away from the flag,so it couldn't be the exhaust problem
Are you sure that you have enabled flags to be shown in the tracking station? (small menu on top)

Are you sure that you have enabled flags to be shown in the tracking station? (small menu on top)

yap,I can see the mun flag,but the minmus one is gone
Its a bug happened to me on Duna a few times.
I had a flag actually explode once, as I was flying near it. That could be what happened to yours. Looks like you'll have to fly another mission out there to replace it.
I think it is a bug about time-warp. Happened to me couple times, it didn't explode when I took of, or flew near it but after I time warp it just disappeared. Might be the same bug
